resources.string:
Hi My name is Abdelrahman. 

My nickname is OBAIDA. 

The most important thing here is to write a long text 
So that I am going to write any long sentences as you can see here 
One of my fav things is to learn new thing because I feel like I am alive 

 And this is a wonderful feeling in fact 

One of my favourite things is to teach people how to live better and now I am trying to write any thing 
And all of the words here are totally random so it does not matter if it will be fact or not 

Also now I am trying to practice more on writing faster on the keyboard 

If you reached this part so I wanna say thank you for being so patient and curious 

Thank you!
